[UPDATE: RESOLVED]
Solved (and caused)  my own problem, at least on chrome- for anyone else who blocks all cookies by default, the solution is to add exceptions not only for the domain in question (e.g. i had allowed all cookies for `<http://mywebsite.com|mywebsite.com>` ) *but to also add an exception for HubSpot cookies.* In hindsight this is obvious, but it had me confounded for a while.

For good measure i used the wildcard tokens for the domain whitelisting: `[*.]<http://mywebsite.com|mywebsite.com>` and `[*.]<http://HubSpot.com|HubSpot.com>` both seemed to be necessary to make it work.
